Class Engine

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.univ.nantes.alma.engine.Engine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class Engine
extends java.lang.Object
implements EngineBridge
    The game engine performing the Game Methods.

    0.0.1
    Author:
    Alexis Claveau, Martin Ars, Maud Van Dorssen, Alexis Loret

                            int idCard,
                            java.util.UUID uuidTargetPlayer,
                            int idTarget)
                     throws EngineException
        Description copied from interface: EngineBridge
        Play a card. Either put a minion card on the board or activate a spell card.
        Specified by:
        playCard in interface EngineBridge
        Parameters:
        uuidGame - the id of the game
        uuidPlayer - the uuid of the player who uses it
        idCard - the id of the card
        uuidTargetPlayer - the player choose (for some spells)
        idTarget - the id of the target
        Returns:
        the game
        Throws:

                             int idTarget)
                      throws EngineException
        Description copied from interface: EngineBridge
        Activate the hero's power.
        Specified by:
        heroPower in interface EngineBridge
        Parameters:
        uuidGame - the id of the game
        uuidPlayer - the uuid of the player who uses it
        uuidTargetPlayer - the chosen player (for some power)
        idTarget - the id of the target, if the power doesn't need a target then set idTarget to 1
        Returns:
        the game
        Throws:
        EngineException - a custom exception
